comment: I loved this class period. It is definitely hard word physically but but as long as you put in effort, you will probably get an A.

Mother Theresa has a great spirit. She's funny and she cares. I learned a lot in her class especially life lessons. I even got the chance to learn how to play the drums. Attendance matters because there are no tests. You're just dancing. It is mandatory to go to two dance shows.

I took her African Dance class and she is amazing. The class is very tiring and exhausting because African dance is fast pace, but you will love every second of it. She is so encouraging and never makes you feel stupid if you don't get the dance the first time. You get 3 free absences, attend the dance concerts and write a reflective paper. Easy A.
